root.name: Zapper: One Wicked Cricket!
root.description: OVERVIEW Zapper: one wicked cricket is an adventure game, developed by Blitz Games and published by Infogrames. Released in North America November 12002 it was releases on the Xbox, GameCube and the PlayStation 2. Gameplay The gameplay in Zapper: one wicked cricket is very similar to the gameplay style of Frogger. The main goal in the game is to rescue the main characters brother who has been taken hostage; to do so you must complete 20 levels of simply put, Frogger during these levels you must collect six eggs which will allow you to complete the level. Xbox Originals On November 17, 2008, Zapper: One Wicket Cricket! became available on the Xbox 360's Xbox Originals service for 1200 Microsoft Points.
